revised_title: Robert Robertson: A Life of Scientific Achievement and Versatility
tldr: Robert Robertson was a renowned explosives expert and versatile scientist. Born in 1869, he made significant contributions to the field of explosives and held various positions in academia and industry. His work on the recovery of acetone vapour from cordite manufacture and the Will test for measuring the rate of decomposition of gun-cotton had a lasting impact on the industry. Robertson's life was marked by his passion for science, education, and historical research.
